((* if content.text.strip() != '' *))
{\setlength\topsep{0pt}\setlength\parskip{0pt}\begin{center}
\begin{tabular}{(((content.cols)))} \hline
((* for t in content.text.split('\n') *))
((* if 'tabular' not in t *))
(((- t -)))
((* endif *))
((* endfor *))
\end{tabular}
\end{center}}
((* endif -*)) (((content.tail)))
